@WHO We are eight weeks into this #COVID19 outbreak: yet your director general comrade @DrTedros has yet admitted that he concealed truth for the evil empire of #CCP #CommunistChina . This sort of corruption at #UN level is unprecedented!
#coronavirus #chinavirus
